message.content:
I need to identify the line item and value that represents the increase in the amounts of tax accrued but not yet paid.

Looking at the cash flow statement, I can see there's a line item called "Increase (Decrease) in Tax Payable" with a value of 278279.50. 

Tax payable represents taxes that have been accrued but not yet paid, so this line item shows the increase in tax accrued but not yet paid during the period.

The positive value of 278279.50 indicates an increase in the tax payable balance (meaning more taxes were accrued than were paid during the period).

```json
{"solution": {'value': '278279.50'}}
```
